[b][color=white]API v2.0 - Suggestions, Ideas, and Discussion[/color][/b]
HF has introduced API v2.0, which includes additional features, including v1.0 features. Members/Developers can share their opinions to improve the API. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077763]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Group Updates[/color][/b]
A lot of changes have been made in Groups. It will give more comprehensive options to Owners and Leaders of the groups. Check out all the new features in the dedicated thread. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077842]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=White]Vacations, Bans & Closures[/color][/b]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=558527][color=#000000][b]Raνe[/b][/color][/url] was banned for "Contracts are mandatory for all deals."

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1830072][color=#000000][b]Trippy Space Cat[/b][/color][/url] was banned for "Fake contest"
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4227846][color=#000000][b]-Scrub[/b][/color][/url] was banned for "Sales Trashing - UNACCEPTABLE"

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077842][color=#FFFFFF]Group Updates[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
Xerotic has added a few new features to groups. These features are focused on making group management easier. One of the new features is adding a blacklist to groups; this means you can add people to the list so they can't ever be added to the group. The second feature added logs, these logs are similar to the crew logs, but they are showing what is happening in groups instead. The last feature is the application requirements. This means you can set requirements for people who request to join the groups.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077763][color=#FFFFFF]API v2.0 - Suggestions, Ideas, and Discussion[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
It has finally happened, Hack Forums has moved to a brand-new version of the API all thanks to Xerotic. The thread has been made to announce the new API update and also for suggestions. With the new API in place expect a lot of new user-made applications, a whole lot of new things are coming.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6078549][color=#FFFFFF]Hacker Group Leaks Lady Gaga Files, Threatens to Next Take Down Donald Trump[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
A group of hackers has gained access to a celebrity known as Lady Gaga. They have started to leak files and have made a massive dent in some of the things that were coming from Lady Gaga. These hackers are currently unknown, but sources state that the hackers are starting to target Donald Trump since they do not like the guy. COS has written an article on the attack and stats that the hackers want 21 million dollars to return the classified data.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077828][color=#FFFFFF]Chinese hackers targeting vaccine research[/color][/url] - [mention=3569962]
With the current virus going around, this news isn't really what people want to see or hear about, but sadly a group of hackers has been targeting vaccine research to try and stop anyone getting any vaccines. The FBI has started to issue warnings to those attempting to find any invulnerability within there systems. The FBI has also has stated that people are trying to identify and obtain valuable intellectual property and public health data.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6077861][color=#FFFFFF]WHO Says That This Virus May Never Go Away[/color][/url] - [mention=1092491]
A member of the W.H.O has stated that the Covid-19 virus may never go away. Even if they bring out a vaccine, the virus may stick around all of us, but they can't really be sure if the virus will just die out or maybe even reform into a deadlier virus that could possibly cause another massive wave of infections and deaths.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075424][color=#FFFFFF]What are the stupid things that you used to believe when you were a kid?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
When we are young, we all do silly things and sometimes we do really bad things, flavoral has made a thread asking what the most stupid thing you ever believed when you were young. Some people have some similar traits that they were told by there parents and some of the members just started to get trolled hard by their siblings. Make sure you check this thread out some of the comments will make your day.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6079028][color=#FFFFFF]How do you track your goals?[/color][/url] - [mention=1003027]
Goals, we have covered what goals people have had but no one ever talks about how you keep track of completing the goals. Well, a user currently known as Captain Cutler has finally made a thread to talk about how people keep a good track of what they are trying to achieve. Some of the ways are very smart and honestly, they really must have 200 IQs.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6078424][color=#FFFFFF]Favorite Colognes[/color][/url] - [mention=4688078]
MrJamesDean is asking people on the site what their favorite colognes are and why everyone seems to be having a very different preference for what they like to wear and some people have even stated that they only wear it because of they just can't stand anything other colognes or because their other half bought it for them and they didn't want to upset them because they didn't like it.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075710][color=#FFFFFF]Nebulance's Pot of Luck Giveaway - 1,500 USD+ with over 40 winners![/color][/url] - [mention=3577885]
We have a massive giveaway going on again, this time its a member is known as Nebulance, they are giving away over $1,500 and it's being shared between 45 lucky members who win, you could be the next big winner of some of the mad prizes. Make sure you check out this massive giveaway before its too late!

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6075672][color=#FFFFFF]4x $100 in VPS & $10 BTC || 5 Winners[/color][/url] - [mention=1206091]
Are you looking to get a free VPS that's not slow? Well look no more you could be the next winner of Tekkie giveaway where you could get a VPS that's worth $100. All you have to do to enter is make a post, you can post once every 24 hours so you can increase your chances at winning with ease.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6076686][color=#FFFFFF]OFFICIAL GROUP MASTERMINDS || $100 GIVEAWAY || LEET/UBER[/color][/url] - [mention=2185870]
Dorrance has made a giveaway thread featuring his group Masterminds and is giving away up to $100 to four lucky winners. You don't have to take the $25 that is offered, but you can also take 4,000 bytes or an upgrade to your hack forums account.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[/spoiler][/color][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/memo.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Group News[/color][/b]
Still working on improving the layout but going forward I've setup a form for group owners and leaders to report directly to me. Only two groups reported this week. Group News will be an easy way for groups to advertise almost anything, I hope groups take advantage of it.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Facebook supplying internet to Africa[/color][/b]
Facebook is preparing to set up an internet cable around Africa in the sea to provide 16 countries with faster internet access. It would be one of the longest to come in at 23,000 miles and about the same length as the Earth's circumference. It's estimated that the cable would cost around $1 billion. “When completed, this new route will deliver much-needed internet capacity, redundancy, and reliability across Africa, supplement a rapidly increasing demand for capacity in the Middle East, and support further growth of 4G, 5G, and broadband access for hundreds of millions of people,” said in their blog. The cable will be ready by 2024 for the new 16 countries to start accessing the internet much quicker than ever before. Four in ten people in Africa have access to the Internet, while six in ten people worldwide have access to the Internet.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-52676253] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Combat Drone[/color][/b]
Boeing unveiled the first unarmed combat drone concept delivered to the Australian Air Force for the first time. The Loyal Wingman can travel with other platforms in place with the Air Force and will be under the influence of Artificial Intelligence. It was the biggest military investment Boeing has made outside the U.S. Loyal Wingman was built using a "digital twin" advanced 3D system that allows engineers to test the aircraft before assembly is started. So far, three of these units have been made.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/boeing-loyal-wingman-a-combat-drone-and-historic-aircraft/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Twitter Employees Can Work from Home Forever[/color][/b]
As States begin their process of re-opening phases, Twitter has announced that they will allow their employees to work at home forever if they choose. Not all staff will be permitted to make this decision, and Twitter has not disclosed to whom it will apply. “If our employees are in a role and situation that enables them to work from home and they want to continue to do so forever, we will make that happen,” said VP of people. Following this, the corporation cancelled all corporate travel and the opening of offices before the end of the year, which can also be extended to 2021, if necessary. Many big tech firms, such as Facebook, Google and Amazon, are allowing their employees to work from home until the end of the year.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/12/tech/twitter-work-from-home-forever/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Anime's 1st Promo Video Reveals Cast[/color][/b]
A promotional video for the upcoming anime, "Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World" has been released. Additionally, the artwork for the two main characters has been shared too. You can check all of that out [url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-15/our-last-crusade-or-the-rise-of-a-new-world-anime-1st-promo-video-reveals-cast/.159588]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-15/our-last-crusade-or-the-rise-of-a-new-world-anime-1st-promo-video-reveals-cast/.159588]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pokémon: Twilight Wings Net Anime's 5th Episode Delayed to June 5 Due to COVID-19[/color][/b]
Pokémon: Twilight Wings is an animated short that is hosted on YouTube. The official spin-off is influenced by the latest games in the Pokémon series, Pokémon Sword & Shield. In total, there will be seven episodes. Sadly, Studio Colorido, posted on their Twitter announcing that the next episode in the series, episode five, won't air until June 5. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-15/pokemon-twilight-wings-net-anime-5th-episode-delayed-to-june-5-due-to-covid-19/.159577]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Kyoto Animation Extends Work Hiatus Due to COVID-19 Through May[/color][/b]
The well-known Japanese animation studio, Kyoto Animation, has recently announced that due to the COVID-19 epidemic they will be on hiatus until the end of May. Now, this should not be a surprise to anyone, as a majority of animation studios are closing their studios down temporarily. One good news is that the studio will be open and employees will be working on Saturdays. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-15/kyoto-animation-extends-work-hiatus-due-to-covid-19-through-may/.159409]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Love Live! Anime Reveals Character Names, New Visual, Returning Staff[/color][/b]
The official website of the "Love Live!" series released a brand new visual key recently. On the visual key showcases the five new characters in the latest series, "Hello! Love Live!" The new five new [url=https://cdn.animenewsnetwork.com/thumbnails/max700x700/cms/news.3/159568/lovelive.jpg]girls[/url] will be Chisato Arashi, Sumire Heanna, Kanon Shibuya, Tan Kuku, and Ren Hazuki. At the moment nothing is known about the project. Cast members are still needed and auditions were meant to be held but due to the coronavirus, these auditions have been postponed. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-14/new-love-live-anime-reveals-character-names-new-visual-returning-staff/.159568]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]23rd Pokémon Film Delayed Due to COVID-19[/color][/b]
The latest movie in the Pokémon series, Pokémon the Movie: Coco, will sadly be delayed due to COVID-19. The anime movie was originally supposed to air in Japan on July 10. At the moment, no new date has been announced. As mentioned in a previous edition, the anime will revolve a new character as well as a new legendary. Koko is a human living in a jungle filled with Pokémon. A reference was made where this story is very similar to the movie George of the Jungle. That being, Koko believes he is a Pokémon himself. He thinks, acts, and moves around like a grass Pokémon would in the jungle. The new mythical Pokémon Zarude is his father. Soon enough, the two will end up meeting our well-known duo Ash and Pikachu who is on an adventure to discover new Pokémon. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-13/23rd-pokemon-film-delayed-due-to-covid-19/.159502]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Idol Group 9nine Reunites Due to COVID-19 for Online Event[/color][/b]
The Japanese idol group, 9nine, will be making a reappearance after being on hiatus for over a year. Only three members of the four-member group will be performing. Those three being Uki Satake, Sayaka Nishiwaki, and Hirona Murata. They'll be performing from their homes. Included in the performance will be live discussions and merchandise for sale. How the merchandise will be sold is unknown at the moment, but most likely links will be provided for fans to purchase items based on the idol group and have it shipped to their house.

The concert will be interesting, that's for sure! For those in the states, if you've been watching live-television or even watching videos on YouTube, you might have stumbled upon celebrities coming together over Zoom calls (or whatever they are using to connect) and singing songs to cheer everyone up. This performance might be something similar to that, but who knows maybe we will be in for a surprise! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-15/idol-group-9nine-reunites-due-to-covid-19-for-online-event/.159605]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Netflix Streams BNA: Brand New Animal Anime in U.S. on June 30[/color][/b]
Those ready for a new anime or those who have seen the first six episodes of Brand New Animal (BNA) illegally and are wanting to watch the remaining legitimately can finally do so soon! BNA will finally be coming to Netflix outside of Japan on June 30. Previously, the only way to watch the anime was illegal as mentioned or if you owned a Japanese Netflix account. The first six episodes aired on March 21 and the remaining six aired on May 6.

The story revolves around a tanuki (Japanese raccoon dog) named Michiru. Michiru was not always a tanuki, she was once a human. In this anime, there are two cities. A human one, and one where animal-humans take refuge due to the human city not accepting them. This animal-human city is called "Anima City." One day, Michiru runs away from her house and takes refuge in this city. You can hear more about her adventures in Anima City on June 30! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-05-15/netflix-streams-bna-brand-new-animal-anime-in-u.s-on-june-30/.159595]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 469
